tabToNewWindow.description: Context menu option that teleports the tab to a new window.

tabToAnotherWindow.description: Context menu option that teleports the tab to another (existing) window.

tabToSelectWindow.description: Context menu option that teleports the tab to the select window.

allTabsToAnotherWindow.message: Teleport all tabs to another window
allTabsToAnotherWindow.description: Context menu option that teleports all the tabs to another (existing) window.

allTabsToSelectWindow.message: Teleport all tabs to a window...
allTabsToSelectWindow.description: Context menu option that teleports all the tabs to the select window.

option_incognito.message: Allow incognito windows as teleport target
option_incognito.description: Extension must be enabled in incognito windows (go to chrome://extensions -> Details -> Allow in incognito mode).

popup_description.message: Chromium extension to move tabs around the browser's windows from context menu or with keyboard shortcuts. Details of the shortcuts can be found on project page.
